name: Endless Ocean 2: Adventures of the Deep
name_original: Endless Ocean 2: Adventures of the Deep
description:
Endless Ocean 2: Adventures of the Deep is an action game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Endless Ocean 2: Adventures of the Deep on Wii.
Hitoshi Yamagami and Ichirou Muhara produced the game. It was directed by Akira Kurabayashi and Masaki Tawara.
